Code: The Hidden Language of Computer Ha: Book for understanding how computers actually work, from basic logic gates up to a full processor.
Grokking Algorithms: A must-read, fully-illustrated guide that makes data structures and algorithms (the fundamentals of coding) easy and fun to understand.
The Pragmatic Programmer: A classic. A collection of essential tips and philosophies on how to be a better, more effective programmer.
A Common-Sense Guide to Data Structures: A great, friendly guide to data structures.
